com.defano.jmonet.canvas

Interface Undoable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JMonetCanvas

    public interface Undoable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaxUndoBufferDepth()
      Gets the maximum depth of the undo buffer.
      int getRedoBufferDepth()
      Gets the number of changes that can be "redone".
      int getUndoBufferDepth()
      Gets the number of changes that can be "undone".
      boolean hasRedoableChanges()
      Determines if an undo is available to revert.
      boolean hasUndoableChanges()
      Determines if a commit is available to be undone.
      boolean redo()
      Reverts the previous undo; has no effect if a commit was made following the previous undo.
      ImageLayerSet undo()
      Undoes the previous committed change.

    • Method Detail

      • undo

        ImageLayerSet undo()
        Undoes the previous committed change. May be called successively to revert committed changes one-by-one until the undo buffer is exhausted.
        Returns:
        The ChangeSet that was undone by this operation, or null if there were no undoable changes.

      • redo

        boolean redo()
        Reverts the previous undo; has no effect if a commit was made following the previous undo.
        Returns:
        True if the redo was successful, false if there is no undo available to revert.

      • hasUndoableChanges

        boolean hasUndoableChanges()
        Determines if a commit is available to be undone.
        Returns:
        True if undo() will succeed; false otherwise.

      • hasRedoableChanges

        boolean hasRedoableChanges()
        Determines if an undo is available to revert.
        Returns:
        True if redo() will succeed; false otherwise.

      • getMaxUndoBufferDepth

        int getMaxUndoBufferDepth()
        Gets the maximum depth of the undo buffer.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of undos that are supported by this PaintCanvas.

      • getUndoBufferDepth

        int getUndoBufferDepth()
        Gets the number of changes that can be "undone".
        Returns:
        The depth of undo buffer.

      • getRedoBufferDepth

        int getRedoBufferDepth()
        Gets the number of changes that can be "redone".
        Returns:
        The depth of the redo buffer.
